description: Master the principles of web design including typography, color theory, layout, and user experience.

lessons.title: Introduction to Web Design
lessons.content: Web design is the process of creating websites that are visually appealing, user-friendly, and functional.

lessons.title: Typography Principles
lessons.content: Typography is the art and technique of arranging type to make written language legible, readable, and appealing.

lessons.title: Color Theory for Web
lessons.content: Understanding color theory is essential for creating visually appealing and effective web designs.

lessons.title: Layout Patterns
lessons.content: Understanding common layout patterns helps create effective and user-friendly web designs.

lessons.title: Spacing and White Space
lessons.content: Proper spacing and use of white space are crucial for creating clean, readable, and visually appealing designs.

lessons.title: Wireframing and Prototyping
lessons.content: Wireframing and prototyping are essential steps in the design process that help visualize and test ideas.

lessons.title: Accessibility and Inclusive Design
lessons.content: Creating websites that are accessible to everyone, regardless of abilities or disabilities.

lessons.title: Mini Project: Landing Page Wireframe
lessons.content: Create a complete wireframe for a landing page that incorporates all the design principles you've learned.

lessons.title: Design Tokens & Color Systems
lessons.content: Learn how to create and implement design tokens and systematic color palettes for consistent design systems.

lessons.title: Spacing Scale & Typography Hierarchy
lessons.content: Create systematic spacing scales and typography hierarchies for consistent and harmonious designs.

lessons.title: Dark Mode Design Principles
lessons.content: Implement dark mode design principles with proper contrast ratios and color considerations for low-light environments.

lessons.title: UI Component Consistency
lessons.content: Maintain consistency across UI components with design systems and component libraries.

lessons.title: Wireframing Techniques
lessons.content: Advanced wireframing techniques for complex layouts and user flows.

lessons.title: Figma/Canva Design Replication
lessons.content: Learn how to replicate designs from design tools like Figma and Canva in actual code.

lessons.title: Usability Testing Basics
lessons.content: Understand the basics of usability testing to validate your design decisions with real users.

lessons.title: Mini Project: Landing Page UI Design (Static Prototype)
lessons.content: Create a complete static prototype of a landing page with all modern web design principles applied.
